title: Starmyu in Halloween
original_name: スタミュ in ハロウィン
opening_song: "Horizont" by Yuuta Hoshitani (Natsuki Hanae), Tooru Nayuki (Kensho Ono), and Kaito Tsukigami (Arthur Lounsbery)
ending_song: "DEAR DREAM!" by Yuuta Hoshitani (Natsuki Hanae), Kakeru Tengenji (Yoshimasa Hosoya), and Shuu Kuga (Tomoaki Maeno)
sinopse:
The new OVA will tell a story about Hoshitani and friends on Halloween. The OVA will feature a music video for the song "Storytellers."

(Source: ANN)
